page.title: 14ELECTRICAL APPLIANCES
page.content: All homes in Gladestry now have electricity. There are a lot of things using it. When our parents were little there were hardly any. Everyone has radios but we don't use them much. All homes have at least one colour television. Most of us watch a lot. Only three have video recorders for copying TV programmes or playing tapes. Everyone has record players to play long playing records, but no-one has a compact(laser) disc player. Two children in our class have computers, but they only use them for games. Most people have pocket calculators but we don't use them in school yet. More than half of the children have digital watches, but some still have clockwork ones. Everyone has telephones. There are some new ones with push buttons but most are the sort with a dial to choose the numbers.
